titleStmt.title: Description of Poetical text, in Persian in Hebrew characters.

availability.licence: This metadata, accompanying images, and the content of London, British Library, Oriental Manuscripts Or 4732: Poetical text, in Persian in Hebrew characters. are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. notesStmt.note: Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Poetical text, in Persian in Hebrew characters.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Persian semi-cursive script of the 18th to 19th century.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine: 'Sahzadah Ve-Sufi. Persian In Hebrew Character. Brit. Mus. Or. 4732.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Purchased by the British Museum on 02 February 1894 from S. J. A. Churchill, Esq. (b. 1862, d. 1921), a British diplomat, art connoisseur and author: inscribed, folio [74v] (fse001v).
